Operators¶

Operators are used to perform operations on variables and values.

  • Arithmetic operators

  • Assignment operators

  • Comparison operators

  • Logical operators

  • Identity operators

  • Membership operators

  • Bitwise operators

Arithmetic operators¶

Arithmetic operators are used with numeric values to perform common mathematical operations:

Operator

Name

+

Addition

-

Subtraction

*

Multiplication

/

Division

%

Modulus

**

Exponentiation

//

Floor division

Example

x = 5
y = 3

a = x + y
b = x - y
c = x * y
d = x / y
e = x % y
f = x ** y
g = x // y

print(a)
print(b)
print(c)
print(d)
print(e)
print(f)
print(g)

>>> %Run -c $EDITOR_CONTENT
8
2
15
1.666667
2
125
1
8
2
15
>>>
